title: OASIS
description: OASIS provides lots of programming for academic support, such as study jams and tutoring sessions, as well as professional support and promoting cultural heritage.

title: Community Resource Centers
description: There are many community resource centers on campus dedicated to serving specific cultures or identities. Each of them have their own programming and/or calendars to highlight other important events and deadlines.

title: UCSD Triton Firsts Initiative
description: UCSD has an official first-generation initiative, and many of the resources and events they have are shared with us! We encourage you to check them out and engage with them directly as well.
